hero.title: Don't Let Your ACA Plan Auto-Renew
hero.description: Auto-renewal can cost you hundreds or thousands of dollars. Get professional renewal support to ensure you have the best coverage at the best price.

warning.title: Why Auto-Renewal is Dangerous
warning.description: When your ACA plan auto-renews, you may miss out on better options, pay more than necessary, or lose important benefits. Here's what can go wrong:

0.title: Higher Premiums
0.description: Your current plan's premium may have increased significantly, and better-priced options may be available that you won't see with auto-renewal.

1.title: Lost Coverage
1.description: Your plan may have changed its network, benefits, or formulary. Auto-renewal means you might lose access to your preferred doctors or medications.

2.title: Missed Subsidies
2.description: Your income or family situation may have changed, making you eligible for better subsidies or cost-sharing reductions that auto-renewal won't capture.

3.title: No Plan Comparison
3.description: Auto-renewal prevents you from comparing all available plans. You might be stuck with a plan that no longer fits your needs or budget.
